text: Bad Hersfeld is the capital of the district Hersfeld-Rotenburg, in the state of Hessen in Germany. It is a well-known festival and spa town. Every summer, the Bad Hersfelder Festspiele (festival) are held here in 1951 at the monastery ruins. It is the largest Romanesque church ruin in Europe. == References == == Other websites == * Official website of Bad Hersfeld * Bad Hersfeld Festival * Lullusfest in Bad Hersfeld Category:Spa towns in Germany Category:Hersfeld-Rotenburg
title: Bad Hersfeld
